“I really tried to hold it, but it was too late!” Donnie exclaimed, lying through his teeth.
“Inside voice, young man. Now, could you tell me why exactly you didn’t try at all to get to the potty? Or why you didn’t even say something like, ‘I need to go potty!’ Quite frankly, I’ve half a mind to put you in time-out for your lies.” At this last statement, Donnie’s eyes widened, dissipating any remaining doubt in the teacher’s mind about his dishonesty.
“Don’t act surprised, Donnie, you’re not the first kid who’s had an ‘accident’ like this. I saw the way you froze up and then pushed. If it were a real accident, your face wouldn’t have reddened quite like it did, and your hands certainly wouldn’t have been balled up!”
Donnie’s face was lined with absolute shame, his mind a swirling maelstrom of fear, shame, disgust and anger.
“You know what, mister, I’ve made up my mind. You’re going to spend ten minutes in time out for your insolence. First of all, however, you need to be changed. We wouldn’t want you coming out of timeout with diaper rash anymore than I’m sure you already have.”
Seeing Donnie’s newly tear-brimmed eyes, the teacher’s face softened immensely, “Come here sweetie, you need to be changed. Can you take off your pants for me?”
A teary-eyed Donnie nodded, following her instructions, albeit slowly, because of multiple fumbled attempts to unbutton his pants.

The teacher, taken aback not by the truth of the statement, -far from it, she had watched him squat down and mess his training pants- but by both the remorse he seemed to feel and by his absolute honesty, quickly moved to comfort him, wrapping him tightly in a hug while cooing sweet nothings at him.

Donnie, ready for the whole ordeal to just end, quickly followed her instructions, surprising himself as he failed to not unbutton his pants on his first attempt. As she laid him down, replacing his trainers mercifully quick, she said “Now, sweetie, you know you aren’t supposed to use your trainers on purpose, and you would usually get three minutes in time-out, but because of your honesty, and the genuine regret and remorse you’ve shown, I think I can waive that just this once. Don’t let this become a habit though, I’m warning you.”
Donnie, fully understanding of the rules, replied in a voice tinted with incredulity “Really? Thank you miss!” Had he not been in the midst of a change, he easily would’ve gotten up and hugged her to death.

Mattias mostly knew it was time to go after his parents were changing him. In fact, he halfway came up with an excuse in his mind that no, he had no reason to go to the potty--Just because he didn't really feel like it. Something was going on inside, but it wasn't feeling like it was just about to come out, so he figured that it was probably okay to just keep doing what they were doing, until he really did feel like it was about to come out.

"Okay. Why don't you play outside, oh, or watch this cartoon while we wait for Joshua?" Matt's dad said, turning on the TV for Mattias to sit in front of.

After about an hour, Joshua arrived. Matt could hear him at the door and smiled as he looked in that direction. He felt himself bobbing to and fro, swishing his tail left and right, but not really paying attention to himself doing so. Joshua walked in, a slightly taller and dressed more like a big boy than Mattias. "Hey matt, how's it goin'?" He held his claws out to smack together. Mattias obliged and stood up, asking about his day.

The two left the TV area and walked out to the backyard where Joshua looked to Matt before they would play. "Hey Matt, did you go potty today?" He asked, Mattias only shaking his head in response. "Oh. Well, you'll tell your daddy if you do, right?" He asked, Mattias nodding in response. "Okay, good." Joshua said as they started playing.

Mattias started playing with the backyard toys with his cousin when he started to move a little funny. Joshua took notice almost immediately. "Hey, you look like you have to go potty." He said to Mattias, who was starting to bend his knees and tuck his tail closer between his legs. "Hey, is it time for potty?" He asked Mattias, who remained silent, a bit too shy to really say much of anything. So he looked around trying to avoid the question as the feeling down below started to get stronger. choices: Stefan waited until he was all done, worrying about how late he would be.
Stefan flushed and yanked his pants up, shuffling quickly to the arcade.
1353311.content:
Stefan paused briefly, the ice cream cone held by his trunk nearly finished as he watched Kristine go on ahead. "I'll be there soon!" He said, taking another bite of his ice cream cone as he tried backing away, glancing in the direction where his house was. Kristine kept jogging toward the arcade before turning around. "What?" She yelled back, planting her paws on her hips. "Come on!" She said, waving him over. Stefan shifted his weight as he took the last bite of his ice cream. "Um, I said I'll be there real soon!" He grinned nervously, nodding in her direction. The fox gave a sharp sigh as she rolled her eyes. "Come on, we have to go now or else we're not gonna get to play!" She huffed, staring Stefan down with an expectant gaze. Stefan began to blush as he pressed his stomach slightly. "Well, I, uh...Forgot something at home. I promise I won't be that long!" He said, folding his hands behind his back. Kristine waved at him dismissively. "Oh whatever, fine. You're gonna be late though!" She said, looking him over and cocking her head. "What's wrong?" She said, noticing how stiffly the elephant was standing. "N-nothing..." He said, looking in a different direction. Kristine gave him a rather unconvinced look. "Do you have to go to the bathroom? Again?" She folded her arms as she tapped her foot, looking behind herself toward the arcade. Stefan bounced in place, pressing his bottom with both of his hands out of sight of the fox. "N-no!" He pried his hands from his rear and began shuffling back home. Kristine rolled her eyes again as she watched him waddle away. "Well, just be quick! Or else it'll be too late. Seeya there!" She gave a quick wave before sprinting off toward the arcade, leaving Stefan to waddle his way home.

Several minutes later, Stefan wobbled up the steps to his extravagant house, unlocking the front door and looking through the pretty glass panel, seeing if anyone was home. He shut the door as he realized that his parents hadn't come home yet, holding his stomach with his lower hands as he make his way to the downstairs bathroom, the quickest option. He moved his hands to his bottom as he worked his way into the bathroom, opening the door with his trunk as he wiggled inside, hastily undoing his suspenders and yanking his pants down, He spun around in place as his tail shot up in the air, and crashed down on the toilet seat, causing the porcelain tank to clink loudly. He only needed to wait a second or two before the sound of flatulence rang inside the small bathroom, echoing outside the open bathroom door. He instinctively looked around himself and out the door, embarrassed at the sounds he was making despite knowing that no one else was home. He let out a big sigh as he finished trumpeting below, impatiently waiting to do the rest. He knew the uncomfortable, bubbling pressure was probably the work of the ice cream, though he took a leisurely long amount of time to get started as he found himself losing that pressure only through more flatulence. He took a deep breath and anxiously leaned from one side to the other, causing his bottom cheeks to ride over the sides of the seat, his shifting turning into nervous bouncing on the toilet seat as he waited to finally start his business. "Come on, come on..." He said, farting several more times as he listen only to the sound of a ticking clock in the hallway outside the bathroom. His mind flashed images of what the new game would be like and what sort of kids he could be playing with if he wasn't busy with the bathroom. He heard the ticking of the clock outside, nearly hopping on the seat as he tried pushing harder to get his business started. Suddenly, he felt a strong feeling below as his stomach rumbled, freezing in place as he gritted his teeth,finally feeling that awaited feeling of doing his business with rapid splashing underneath. He sighed and rested on the seat for a few moments before the clock ticking reminded him of what he was missing out on.

Stefan continued sitting on the toilet for a few more minutes, but couldn't help but feel that Kristine was waiting at the arcade without him, most likely getting more and more bothered that she might not have any of her friends she could play with. Stefan tried to continue doing his business, but continually became more and more distracted at the thought of missing out on a good time with his friends. "Oh, come on!" He thought to himself as he felt a good amount of the pressure subside, but not all of it. "I have to make it in time! Or else..." He began shifting his weight left and right again as he stressed himself out over time, beginning to think of what he should do.

"That's enough! I'm going to be late if I don't leave right now!" He thought to himself, holding himself to the seat suddenly. "But I'm not all done yet.." He remembered as some bubbling pressure still flared in his stomach. "But I have to! I don't even have time to wipe, I have to, or else...Goodness!" He thought as he worried himself further.

Not wanting to lag behind his Foxy friend Stefan think about using the toilet at the arcade later. Running across the empty junction catching up to Kristine. They both jog around the corner to be greeted by the building painted bright red as if it's just built yesterday. Metal light sign "PP Arcade" written in multi coloured neon light hang above the entrance. Clear glass panels on the exterior show the crowd inside consist of mostly adolescences and teenager gathering up at the newly installed arcade cabinets placed in rows. Each cabinet have their own design with a gigantic letters printed on the top of it. Quickly glance to the left Stefan saw a teenager driving in a large cabinet in which the screen's showing the inside view of the racing track. "Super Grand Prix 2000" Which is a new to Stefan as the years are titled ahead of present. To the right he saw a handful of kids taking turn at shooting at the tank that chase them with the train track riding behind them "Cart Pursuit" can be seen painted on the top of cabinet. Before able to observe any further He was dragged in by Kristine who try to squeeze through crowds of kids "This way Stefie." Kristine seem to be really excited with the arcade game as she's walk through the crowds, Stefan on the other hand grew slightly uncomfortable as having to squeeze through gathering crowds and getting pushed, elbowed in the stomach doesn't help with his needs earlier. Arriving at the arcade they wanted. The Street Brawlers 2 : Global fighters. The critically acclaim sequel to the first Street brawler game that people were introduced to a bunch of fancy fighter, each with their unique moves like throwing fireball. Performing gliding moves and doing the moon pile diver that player can see the fighter launched down from the skies-

[side note : While in reality Street fighter 1 is not that good due to unusual control schemes and unresponsive control. Let's pretend that in this universe that game steal the world spotlight and appear on 'Fur-tendo' ]

-Waiting in the queue drawing a handful of tokens from her pants pocket. She turns back toward Stefan with anticipations. "Here we are, the Street Brawlers 2! Heard that there are bunch of new characters, a more fancy moves and many thing that I'm so excited to play!" Rally up her hypes as she wait for people to get off and move up the queue as appeared to be playing in a form of 'loser leave'. As the current player swiftly beat up another player's character. "Uhm, yea~" Stefan can't say much due to his stomach acting up earlier from squeezing. He should had went to the bathroom but in the same time not wanting Kristine to wait up for him and miss her fun he decide to stay in the queue. Watching Kristie getting in the chair and pop her token in, following by her selecting a Chinese mink who's wearing a really tight spandex pants joking talking to the other kid about going easy on her, only to be mercilessly have her character knocked out on the first round. Flipping her bang to the side as a sign for Stefan that she is in 'get serious' mood. Kristine make a swift comeback as she win the 2nd round with close call. On the third round however Her opponent seem to be able to read her moves and countered Kristine's character until timer ran out which result in Kristine lose the match by health. Still cheerful as usual she gets off laughing a bit to herself while patting on Stefan's shoulder "It's your turn Stefie!" before waiting at the end of the queue. Taking a deep breath to calm his guts [both metaphorical and literal] He sit down in the chair and insert the token.

info.brief_description: In honor of the deleted Potty Training Tales, I've decided to, in essence, recreate it
info.description:
As you can gather by the title, the main focus of this tale will be, of course, potty training. The ranges can vary, but no older than say, seven.

Rules:

1. Stay in character, so unless you write the kid as really smart, don't have them quote Socrates or the like.
2. Try and add detail, unless you have to write a single line choice chapter. Not paragraphs long, but just a few sentences.
3. You can go far in potty scenarios, but try not to be overtly graphic.
4. No swearing or nudity (Unless its for a bath, or bare bottom based training)
5. Have fun
